entries.title_d: The X-Wing squadron that's covering the rear of the fleet is being followed by Imperial fighters. Assist them in defeating the Imperial scum while the fleet escapes.
entries.title: Yavin system: Assist X-Wing squad in defeating Imperial patrols.
entries.quest_location_d: While flying over to the X-Wing squadron, be careful to not attract more Imperial fighters. The Yavin system is crawling with them.
entries.quest_helpallies_d: We would send in more reinforcements but the whole idea here is to not let the Empire know the amount of ship we have in transit right now. You and the X-Wing squadron will be on your own. Good luck!
entries.quest_findbattle_d: The X-Wing squadron has set these coordinates as the location where they will perform their counter attack. Join up with them quickly.
entries.found_loc: Good to see you pilot. Proceed to these coordinates.
entries.enemies_win: My ship is burning up! Get out of he...
entries.enemies_remain: X-Wing Squad Leader: < Good job everyone, only %DI Imperial scum to go! >
entries.enemies_arrived: There they are, get ready guys!
entries.battle_started: Here they come, attack pattern Green 2! Give them a fight they won't forget!
entries.allies_win: Fantastic job pilot! If you ever look for a reassignment to a squad, look me up. Now lets get out of here.
entries.allies_remain: Rebel Pilot: < Critical system failure, my engines are burning! I nee... >
entries.allies_arrived: They started following us a while back, we can't let them reach the fleet.
